TopicTitle: Alien Manager (VERY WIP) (Not public at the moment)

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone from ksp here is my second mod (it's not a mod but a plugin!)

My plugin will be alien manager. But in the future the mods will be public. thank you for your patience

 

Edited January 16, 2017 by SamBelanger
Sounds mysterious SamBelanger, what will this plugin do?

This plugin will make an api with the TextureReplacer. The Alien Manager plugin will be a model plugin to change the kerbal model. EX: in the future of the mod Avatar-Mods it will have the model and the skin of the Na'vi and Human!

Edited January 17, 2017 by SamBelanger

This type of vague post is, in my opinion, always a telltale sign of someone who is promising more than they can deliver. Why even make such a vague post? Why not  make a post when you have something to show? 

I wish you all the best, op, but I'll believe it when I see it.

20 hours ago, SamBelanger said:

This plugin will make an api with the TextureReplacer. The Alien Manager plugin will be a model plugin to change the kerbal model. EX: in the future of the mod Avatar-Mods it will have the model and the skin of the Na'vi and Human!

I, for one, hope you succeed.  For a while I've had a desire for a rounded, human face.  

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/149587-request-transforming-kerbal-head-project/#comment-2795478

So, also good luck.  What progress do you think you have made?

Peace.
